snippet.title: Unicopia trailer
snippet.description:
Unicopia is a retro 2D platformer featuring a Unicorn racing to rescue her girlfriend from the clutches of an Evil Poodle. Jump up and down towers, collect gems, and reveal the key before the clock strikes and you're haunted by the ghost of time!

Visit Steam for details: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2971450/Unicopia/
